Job Title: Sales Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About Hearth
Hearth is a Fintech company helping home improvement contractors grow and manage their business. Our SaaS platform provides over 14,000 contractors the financial tools they need to close more business, including financing solutions, invoicing, payment collections, insurance products, all in one, modern system designed specifically for the home improvement industry.Backed by 8VC, Founders Fund, and other prominent leaders in Silicon Valley, Hearth has raised over $50M and is one of the fastest growing companies in the home improvement space.
The Mission
To us, the home improvement contractor is a true embodiment of the American Dream – skilled craftspeople who choose to start their own business to build a better life for their families and their communities.
While home improvement professionals power a $500 billion per year industry and protect the homes of millions of Americans, they are typically overlooked by Wall Street and Silicon Valley, and are one of the most underserved, undercapitalized, and written-off segments of entrepreneurs.
We built Hearth to tip the odds of success in their favor. Hearth is a seamless digital toolkit that helps home improvement pros win more projects, grow their sales, and save time running their business. In the last six years, we’ve built an industry-leading technology platform (Financing, Payments, Quotes, Contracts, and Banking), work with over 15,000 contractors, and have funded over $500 million in additional projects for home improvement pros. And, we are just getting started.
Your Mission
Hearth revenue teams are ready to enter an inflection point of growth. To do so, we are expanding our customer acquisition systems and to support this growth we are looking for strong leadership. Your mission will be to lead a team of sales professionals to tell Hearth’s story, represent the company as our front-lines, and start conversations with ideal customers at scale.
You will be supported by a world-class enablement team, as well as mature Customer Success, Marketing, and Product teams. As a fast-growing Series B fintech SaaS startup, Hearth is well-capitalized by some of the strongest venture capital firms and investors in America
Here’s what you’ll do:Help the team hit their revenue and sales efficiency metrics to ensure Hearth scales rapidly and efficientlyGuide a team of 8-12 sales professionals to achieve and exceed targetsBuild a world-class solutions driven high volume sales team by investing in and developing the teamLeverage your experience and demonstrate how to get things done: engage and convert customers, deliver demos, develop contact strategies, new objection handling techniques, etc.Use data to inform your choices (you must be comfortable analyzing data and forming actions)Create a culture of accountability and continuous improvement that is highly connected to the mission of helping small businesses and their customers.Develop the sales skills of your direct reports through 1:1’s, effective team meetings, call coaching and training. Your presence should accelerate the development and career aspirations of those reporting to you
Here’s what we’re looking for:4+ years managing high-volume inside sales, preferably within a high-growth SaaS company in a remote environmentDeep sales skill set including managing a team to quota, pipeline management, objection handling, coaching team members, and Salesforce experienceExcellent analytical skills , including the ability to gather and examine data sets, including the use of basic statistical concepts, and interpret them to make business choices (seriously, this is important - you have to understand and own your numbers)Demonstrated ability to prioritize among battling priorities and apply resources to the best outcomesProven ability to lead teams remotely and work cross-functionally in a highly collaborative environmentResourceful, self-motivated , and able to be successful in an entrepreneurial team-based environmentExcellent verbal & written communication skillsYou have high emotional intelligence & Self-awarenessBachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experienceAffinity for local businessesExperience selling solutions or products to small businesses is a huge plus.Ideal: previous experience in home improvement or financial lendingIdeal: past experience in leading SMB, inside sales teamsIdeal: past experience with transactional salesIdeal: past startup experience - you thrive in a fast-paced environment with frequent change
Benefits:Mission-driven, values-based culture.Competitive pay.Unmatched opportunities to learn and develop; front-row seat at a fast-growing tech startupGenerous PTO, plus paid company holidays.Stock options.Medical, dental, and vision options.401(k)Free Employee Assistance ProgramParental Leave ProgramPet Insurance
Compensation:Salary is one part of Hearth’s competitive package. OTE consists of base salary plus a variable target for sales roles. The base for this role ranges from $70,000-$75,000, the variable target is between $70,000-$75,000, and total cash OTE compensation can be expected to be between $140,000-$150,000.
The expected compensation range for this position is displayed in compliance with all local/state regulations. The expected compensation range for this position is based on a number of factors, including but not limited to: individual education, qualifications, and prior work experience. The total annual compensation package will consist of a base salary and eligibility to participate in our sales commission structure.
LocationRemote
More About UsHearth embraces diversity. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and do not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, national origin, citizenship, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
